investigation.title: The impact of deep space radiation on cognitive performance: From biological sex to biomarkers to countermeasures  (Flow Cytometry, Microglia)
investigation.description: In the coming decade, astronauts will travel back to the moon in preparation for future Mars missions. Exposure to galactic cosmic radiation (GCR) is a major obstacle for deep space travel.

project.title: The Role of Oxidative Stress and Inflammation on Synaptic Functions After Exposure to Space Radiation

publications.title: The impact of deep space radiation on cognitive performance: From biological sex to biomarkers to countermeasures  (Flow Cytometry, Microglia)
